content:
Here's a history of the world, set to a singable melody and with accompanying sheet music! Feel free to improvise and make it your own, and enjoy the journey through time!

Verse 1:
From the Big Bang to the present day
A story waiting to be told our way
From stars and planets, to life on Earth
A journey that began with a cosmic birth

Chorus:
Oh, the history of the world is a song we sing
With every note, we remember everything
From the rise and fall of civilizations old
To the march of progress, as we grow bold

Verse 2:
From ancient empires to the Industrial Age
We've written our own story, page by page
From the Renaissance to the age of tech
We've always looked to the future, with each step

Chorus:
Oh, the history of the world is a song we sing
With every note, we remember everything
From the rise and fall of civilizations old
To the march of progress, as we grow bold

Bridge:
With every chorus, we come full circle
From the Big Bang to now, it's all in the mix
With every verse, we add to the story
A history of the world, like a never-ending song

Chorus:
Oh, the history of the world is a song we sing
With every note, we remember everything
From the rise and fall of civilizations old
To the march of progress, as we grow bold

Outro:
So let us sing this song of history
With every note, we'll make it all come alive
And as we reach the final chord
We'll look back, and know, this is our world.

Sheet Music:

From the Big Bang to the present day
C G Am F
A story waiting to be told our way
F C G Am
From stars and planets, to life on Earth
F C G C
A journey that began with a cosmic birth

Oh, the history of the world is a song we sing
D Am D
With every note, we remember everything
G C G
From the rise and fall of civilizations old
D Am G
To the march of progress, as we grow bold

We've always looked to the future, with each step
